title: #PriceHike : Medicine importers want price hike, again
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Medicine Importers’ Association has requested the Health Authorities to increase the prices of medicines, once again.
Secretary to the State Ministry of Pharmaceuticals, Supplies, and Regulation, Dr. Saman Ratnayake stated that they have made this request because of the depreciation of the rupee against the dollar.
The Secretary further stated that their request was referred for study.
Meanwhile, due to the shortage of certain medicines and surgical equipment, some hospital activities have been disrupted.
